title: Desert Water Intake Schedule
brief: Follow specific hourly water intake schedules based on temperature to prevent heat casualties.
steps: Step 1: Check ambient temperature using thermometer or estimate based on conditions.
Step 2: If temperature is below 38Â°C (100Â°F), drink 0.5 liters of water every hour.
Step 3: If temperature is above 38Â°C (100Â°F), drink 1 liter of water every hour.
Step 4: Continue this schedule regardless of thirst levels - thirst is unreliable.
Step 5: Sip water constantly even when supply is low to maintain body cooling.
warnings: Do not ration water - this leads to heat casualties.
Thirst only indicates two-thirds of actual water needs.
If water is scarce, do not eat - food requires water for digestion.
